metadata.description: Cross-platform offline-first mobile/desktop app for construction inspectors
metadata.session_notes: Session 343: Code reviewed Phase 1+2 implementations (2 parallel agents). Fixed 6 issues (mock type safety, DRY median, pre-sort, cast cleanup, doc comment). 717 tests pass. Phases 3-4 next.

current_phase.phase_name: Pipeline Accuracy: Grid Line Detection + Row OCR

active_blockers.title: Flutter OCR rendering platform bindings timeout in headless integration tests
active_blockers.notes: Printing.raster() Stream API cannot be mocked in unit tests. Integration tests fail with timeout. Need to either: (1) use integration_test harness, (2) mock at lower level, or (3) skip OCR rendering tests in headless mode.
active_blockers.impact: Delays OCR golden fixture regeneration and benchmark suite validation

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Deprecated APIs used for field mapping (Syncfusion migrating to new API surface)
dependencies_at_risk.action_needed: Audit before next upgrade, test IDR template field mapping

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Platform channel timeout issues on some devices (GitHub issues open)

team_context.work_style: Orchestration-based (user defines plans, Claude executes with agents)
